resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "You can now register rapid PCR tests in the Corona-Warn-App and receive the result and your test certificate through the app."

"The assignment of certificates to people has been made more error-tolerant. Minor differences in the spelling of first and last names are ignored, so affected certificates can still be assigned to the same person."

"The EU specifications for vaccination certificates for booster vaccinations have changed. If your certificate no longer matches the current specifications, you can request a new one directly in the Corona-Warn-App."
